member.name: T:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.FAQPlusPlus.Cards.ResponseCard
member.summary: This class process Response Card- Response by bot when user asks a question to bot.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.FAQPlusPlus.Cards.ResponseCard.GetCard(Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Knowledge.QnAMaker.Models.QnASearchResult,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Teams.Apps.FAQPlusPlus.Common.Models.ResponseCardPayload)
member.summary: Construct the response card - when user asks a question to the QnA Maker through the bot.
member.param: The response model.
Actual question that the user has asked the bot.
The base URI where the app is hosted.
The response card payload.
member.returns: The response card to append to a message as an attachment.

members.member:
